about.title: About Cosmic Insights
about.subtitle: Bridging ancient wisdom with modern understanding to guide you on your spiritual journey

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.desc1: Founded in 1995 by Pandit Rajesh Sharma, Cosmic Insights began as a small consultancy dedicated to providing authentic Vedic astrological guidance. Over the decades, we have grown into a trusted name in astrology, renowned for our accuracy, integrity, and compassionate approach.
ourStory.desc2: Today, our team of expert astrologers continues the tradition of blending ancient wisdom with modern understanding, helping thousands of individuals navigate life's challenges and discover their true potential.

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.desc: To illuminate life paths through authentic astrological guidance, helping individuals make informed decisions, overcome challenges, and fulfill their cosmic potential.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.description: We practice traditional Vedic astrology with integrity, respecting its ancient wisdom.

compassion.title: Compassion
compassion.description: We approach every consultation with empathy and understanding of life's complexities.

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.description: We believe in giving you knowledge to make informed decisions, not creating dependency.

respect.title: Respect
respect.description: We honor all spiritual paths and cultural backgrounds in our practice.

experts.name: Pandit Rajesh Sharma
experts.title: Founder & Chief Astrologer
experts.description: With over 40 years of experience in Vedic astrology, Pandit Rajesh combines traditional wisdom with practical guidance.

experts.name: Dr. Sunita Verma
experts.title: Senior Astrologer & Palmist
experts.description: Specializing in relationship astrology and palmistry, Dr. Sunita has helped thousands find clarity in their personal lives.

experts.name: Acharya Vikram Singh
experts.title: Numerologist & Remedy Expert
experts.description: A master of numerology and remedial measures, Acharya Vikram excels at finding practical solutions to complex problems.

sacredMission.title: Our Sacred Mission
sacredMission.desc1: For over two decades, Cosmic Insights has been a beacon of authentic astrological wisdom, helping thousands of souls discover their true purpose and navigate life's cosmic currents with confidence and clarity.
sacredMission.desc2: Founded by a lineage of traditional Vedic astrologers, we honor the ancient scriptures while embracing modern understanding to provide relevant, accurate, and transformative guidance for today's seekers.
sacredMission.desc3: Our approach combines rigorous astrological analysis with compassionate counseling, ensuring that each consultation not only reveals cosmic insights but also provides practical guidance for real‑world challenges.

astrology.description1: Astrology is the ancient science that studies the correlation between celestial movements and earthly events. hero.title: Vedic Astrology
hero.subtitle: Unlock the mysteries of your life through comprehensive Vedic astrological analysis

whatIs.title: What is Vedic Astrology?
paragraphs: Vedic astrology, also known as Jyotisha, is the ancient Indian system of astrology that has been practiced for over 5,000 years. Unlike Western astrology, Vedic astrology uses the sidereal zodiac and incorporates unique techniques for precise predictions and spiritual guidance.

Our comprehensive astrological analysis examines your birth chart (Kundali) to reveal insights about your personality, relationships, career, health, and spiritual path. We use traditional calculation methods combined with modern interpretation techniques for maximum accuracy.

Each consultation includes detailed analysis of planetary positions, house interpretations, dasha (planetary periods), and personalized remedial measures to enhance positive influences and mitigate challenges.

included.title: What's Included in Your Reading
included.subtitle: Comprehensive analysis covering all aspects of your cosmic blueprint

items.title: Detailed birth chart reading
items.description: In-depth interpretation of your Kundali with practical guidance.

items.title: Planetary period analysis
items.description: Examination of your current and future dasha periods for timing insights.

items.title: Life predictions and guidance
items.description: Forecasts for key life areas—career, relationships, health, and more.

items.title: Remedial measures
items.description: Personalized suggestions—mantras, gemstones, rituals—to balance your chart.

consultationProcess.subtitle: A structured approach to deliver accurate and meaningful insights

Chart Preparation – creating your sidereal birth chart
Analysis & Interpretation – expert planetary study
Guidance & Remedies – personalized action plan

hero.title: Numerology
hero.subtitle: Unlock the mystical power of numbers and discover your life's hidden patterns and destiny

science.title: The Science of Numbers
paragraphs: Numerology is the ancient metaphysical science that reveals the mystical relationship between numbers and life events. Based on the belief that numbers carry vibrational energy, numerology can provide profound insights into your personality, destiny, and life purpose.

By analyzing the numbers derived from your birth date and name, we can uncover your life path number, destiny number, soul urge number, and other significant numerical influences that shape your journey through life.
Our numerological analysis provides practical guidance for making important decisions, understanding your natural talents, and choosing the most auspicious timing for significant life events.

hero.title: Palmistry
hero.subtitle: Discover your destiny written in the lines of your palms through ancient palmistry wisdom

whatIs.title: The Ancient Art of Palm Reading
paragraphs: Palmistry, also known as chiromancy, is an ancient divination practice that has been used for thousands of years to understand personality traits, predict future events, and gain insights into an individual's life path through the study of palm lines, mounts, and hand characteristics.

Your palms contain a detailed map of your life's journey. Every line, mount, and finger formation tells a unique story about your personality, relationships, career prospects, health patterns, and spiritual development.

Our expert palmists combine traditional techniques with modern psychological understanding to provide you with accurate, insightful readings that can guide your decisions and illuminate your path forward.

lines.title: Understanding Your Palm Lines
lines.subtitle: Each line on your palm tells a unique story about different aspects of your life

items.name: Life Line
items.description: Reveals vitality, health, and major life events
items.note: Shows your energy levels and life path

items.name: Heart Line
items.description: Indicates emotional nature and relationships
items.note: Reveals your capacity for love and emotional expression

items.name: Head Line
items.description: Shows intellectual capacity and mental approach
items.note: Indicates thinking patterns and decision‑making style

items.name: Fate Line
items.description: Career path and life direction indicators
items.note: Shows how external forces shape your destiny
